GLOWS_UNAVAILABLE: {{author}} At least one of the **Glow** codes you provided is empty
GLOW_CODES_UNIQUE: {{author}} You cannot use the same **Glow** more than once for this process
GLOWS_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} At least one of the **Glow** codes you provided is either invalid or not in your inventory
GLOWS_NOT_IN_INVENTORY: {{author}} At least one of the **Glows** you provided is no longer in your inventory
